46 namespace Mutation {
47  namespace Utilities {

49 
50 template <class PTYPE> class Provider;
51 
57 template <class PTYPE>
58 class Factory
59 {
60 public:
61 
65  void add(Provider<PTYPE>* p_provider)
66  {
67  typename std::map<std::string, Provider<PTYPE>*>::const_iterator it;
68  it = m_providers.find(p_provider->getName());
69 
70  if (it == m_providers.end())
71  m_providers[p_provider->getName()] = p_provider;
72  else {
73  throw LogicError()
74  << "Provider <" << p_provider->getName() << "> has already "
75  << "been registered for type " << PTYPE::typeName();
76  }
77  }
78 
82  Provider<PTYPE>* getProvider(const std::string& key)
83  {
84  typename std::map<std::string, Provider<PTYPE>*>::const_iterator it;
85  it = m_providers.find(key);
86 
87  if (it != m_providers.end())
88  return dynamic_cast<Provider<PTYPE>*>(it->second);
89 
90  // Error because key is not a valid provider
91  InvalidInputError error("key", key);
92  error << "Provider <" << key << "> for type " << PTYPE::typeName()
93  << " is not registered. Possible providers are:\n";
94  for (it = m_providers.begin() ; it != m_providers.end(); it++)
95  error << " " << it->first << "\n";
96  throw error;
97  }
98 
102  static Factory<PTYPE>& getInstance()
103  {
104  static Factory<PTYPE> f;
105  return f;
106  }
107 
111  static PTYPE* create(const std::string& name, typename PTYPE::ARGS args)
112  {
113  Provider<PTYPE>* p_provider = getInstance().getProvider(name);
114  if (p_provider == NULL)
115  return NULL;
116  return p_provider->create(args);
117  }
118 
122  static std::vector<std::string> names() {
123  std::vector<std::string> names;
124  typename std::map<std::string, Provider<PTYPE>*>& providers =
125  getInstance().m_providers;
126  typename std::map<std::string, Provider<PTYPE>*>::const_iterator iter;
127  for (iter = providers.begin(); iter != providers.end(); ++iter)
128  names.push_back(iter->first);
129  return names;
130  }
131 
132 private:
133 
137  Factory() {}
138 
142  ~Factory() {}
143 
144 private: // data
145 
146  // archive of providers with type <name, Provider*>
147  std::map<std::string, Provider<PTYPE>*> m_providers;
148 
149 }; // class Factory

151 
157 class NamedObject
158 {
159 public:
160 
164  NamedObject(const std::string& name)
165  : m_name(name)
166  { }
167 
171  ~NamedObject() {}
172 
176  std::string getName() const {
177  return m_name;
178  }
179 
180 private:
181 
182  // name of the object
183  std::string m_name;
184 
185 }; // class NamedObject
186 
187 
193 template <class PTYPE>
194 class Provider : public NamedObject
195 {
196 public:
197 
201  Provider(const std::string& name)
202  : NamedObject(name)
203  {
204  Factory<PTYPE>::getInstance().add(this);
205  }
206 
210  virtual ~Provider() {}
211 
215  virtual PTYPE* create(typename PTYPE::ARGS args) = 0;
216 
217 }; // class Provider
218 
219 
226 template <class CTYPE, class PTYPE>
227 class ObjectProvider : public Provider<PTYPE>
228 {
229 public:
230 
234  ObjectProvider(const std::string& name)
235  : Provider<PTYPE>(name)
236  { }
237 
241  ~ObjectProvider() {}
242 
247  PTYPE* create(typename PTYPE::ARGS args) {
248  return new CTYPE(args);
249  }
250 
251 }; // class ObjectProvider
252 
253  } // namespace Config
254  } // namespace Utilities
255 } // namespace Mutation
